title: Learn about the interpretation of soup in a dream according to Ibn Sirin.

preview.text: Soup in a dream is considered one of the main dishes on the table and is preferred by many in its various forms and types, as there is vegetable, meat, chicken soup, and others. It is characterized by its many benefits and delicious taste. Seeing soup in a dream has many distinctive signs and meanings that have been explained to us by senior experts. This is due to the multiplicity of visual details whether he is dealing with them or just preparing them. Therefore, we will present the various interpretations on our website as follows: Soup in a dream Soup in a dream Seeing soup in a dream indicates the arrival of good and abundance of livelihood for the dreamer and his desire for the coming events to bring him pleasure and material well-being. If he is suffering from a disease in reality, then seeing soup in his dream is considered a good omen of a speedy recovery and relief from suffering and physical pain. He returns to his normal life and performs his duties, works and achieves what he wants, and God knows best. On the other hand, some interpreters found that hot soup is a reflection of the thoughts that revolve in the dreamer's mind, represented by his feeling of loneliness and insecurity, especially at that stage of his life, because he left it. Through a failed marriage, an emotional experience, or many disagreements with his family or friends, which led to psychological problems and disorders. Soup in a dream for Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin interprets the vision of soup in a dream with many good signs that promise the dreamer to hear good news and expect happy surprises that will have a positive impact on his life. He will also achieve great success in his professional or emotional life. Life, and thus he will get what he wants from goals and desires. He reached the position of the position he had always sought, and therefore his life will be filled with prosperity and peace of mind. It also proves that eating meat soup is evidence of recovery from diseases and illnesses and the end of the anxiety and crises that a person suffers from and causes problems and insomnia in his life and deprives him of feeling safe and secure. The more the soup has a good and delicious taste, it indicates the good omens of the fortune teller and achieving what he wants from his goals and desires without having to waste a lot of time and effort. Soup in a dream for a single woman Seeing soup in the dream of an unmarried woman shows many blessed signs that confirm her good condition and facilitate her affairs in the coming period. It is one of the distinctive dishes that is easy to digest, and therefore it is a symbol of ease after many years. Of misery and misery and difficult matters, she should enjoy a stable and peaceful life full of happiness and prosperity, God willing. If the girl prepared onion soup in her dream and then ate it, this is a good indication of her recovery from health problems and the improvement of her financial situation, as she enjoys good company that represents support and support for her in all difficult situations and happy occasions. This may be represented in her imminent marriage to the young man she desires as her life partner. Interpretation of seeing vegetable soup in a dream for a single woman Interpreters have pointed out the good omens of seeing an unmarried girl vegetable soup, as it is a symbol of courage and the multiplicity of blessings in her life. The dream also confirms the death of the hardships and sorrows that she goes through. And she wishes that the next one will be full of happiness and prosperity and the fulfillment of goals and desires by the order of God. If she is afraid or hesitant about something, she should get rid of these negative feelings and be bold and decisive. To achieve what he aspires to. Seeing soup in a girl's dream is evidence of success and excellence in her academic life, in case she is a science student, which makes her get the required academic qualification. But emotionally, she will have a new good man who will provide her with happiness and prosperity and she will find in him a responsible father for her children in the future, God willing. Interpretation of the dream of cooking vegetable soup for single women Seeing an unmarried woman cooking vegetable soup indicates reconciliation and the end of disputes and arguments with those close to her, and thus she lives in a calm atmosphere where she enjoys psychological comfort and stability. She will also be closer to her. Dreams and ambitions since she thought they were difficult to achieve, so the dream is a message to her that hope always exists and she should not resort to despair and disappointment because they are ways that lead to failure. If the dreamer sees herself preparing dishes of soup and distributing them to people, this indicates her good character towards those around her and her constant readiness to help others overcome their crises and assist them, as she is characterized by good morals and strong faith. The dream may be a good omen of her happiness in her engagement to one of them. Soup in a dream for a married woman If a married woman is suffering from financial difficulties and her inability to meet her needs or the demands of her children, then seeing soup in her dream is a message of good news to improve her living conditions and her desire for the next. She will be better, God willing, by her husband's promotion from work and earning a sufficient income, she will provide him with a comfortable and happy life, or she will get her own job that will change her life positively and enable her to achieve her goals and ambitions. As for her feeling of emotional emptiness and loneliness at that stage of her life, due to her husband's mistreatment and the outbreak of many arguments and quarrels between them, then seeing a dish of soup is considered a commendable sign of the disappearance of her husband. The worries and problems that she goes through and the improvement of the situation between them so that her husband cares for her and takes care of her as he was in the past. This is due to her patience and rationality in overcoming difficulties and her desire to preserve her home and provide security for her children. Eating soup in a dream for a married woman The more delicious and delicious the taste of the soup, the more it shows her a happy and stable life full of blessings and good deeds and facilitates matters, because she witnesses great grace and good fortune. Therefore, she is about to achieve her aspirations and hopes for her. She also has a promise to end the problems, the family sector or with the husband's family, which makes her enjoy peace and psychological reassurance. Eating soup against her will and feeling its bad taste is one of the bad signs that she is going through some problems and suffering in her life. This may be due to the material problems that she faces, which cause her to accumulate debts on her. Burdens on her shoulders, feeling distressed, and resorting to sadness and depression. title: Dream Interpretation of Pubic Hair: Seeing Pubic Hair in a Dream

preview.text: Seeing pubic hair and pubic hair in dreams is one of the disturbing dreams that the dreamer sees and wants to know its interpretation, as the vision comes in different forms such as shaving pubic hair, removing pubic hair, or showing long pubic hair, other visions we will tell you about in detail in the continuation of the topic. The interpretation of pubic hair in a dream Pubic hair in a dream, if he shaves or removes it, indicates the loss of religion, and worries end, and pubic hair in a woman's dream indicates an orchard or farm that is not good for spoiled plants. And whoever sees that he looks at his gates and does not see any hair in them, this means that he will be involved in something because of his lack of experience and will fall into trouble because of it and he may end up losing money or the bank will seize it. His money. And if the hair is abundant, he may have gained a lot of money by corrupting religion, and pubic hair may indicate the year and its followers, and plucking pubic hair may indicate harm to the seer. And whoever sees that his pubic hair has become long, this means that the dreamer will be entangled with a foreigner, and this person is not from the religion of Islam, and it was said: Long pubic hair indicates the corruption of the dreamer, then the arrival of relief, guidance and repentance, and they also said: Whoever sees that he shaved his pubic hair with a razor, he is worthy of praise, and if the woman sees this, her husband will reward her for good. Whoever dreams of shaving his pubic hair with a razor is good for both men and women, and perhaps this vision for a woman indicates the safety of the person concerned or the debtor, and he saw that he shaved his pubic hair. This indicates the loss of his debts or the loss of his worries. Whoever sees another person shaving his pubic hair, this means that there is someone who will help you overcome the bad crises that you are going through, while the length of the pubic area shows worries, difficulties and debts, because this is against the laws. And shaving the pubic area is relief from worries and sorrows, collecting money, paying off debts, and preserving the laws, and the man who sees that his pubic area is very long, a rift will occur between him and his wife. And the woman who sees that her pubic area has grown a lot, will leave her husband, and the prostitute who sees that her pubic area has grown a lot, this means that she enjoys repentance from fornication, because the loss of her pubic hair means not following the righteous who follow the Sunnah of the Prophet. And whoever sees her fiancé or lover removing her pubic hair, this indicates that there are things that you will suffer from and cause you distress, and the vision predicts comfort and the end of this worry from you soon. The growth of pubic hair for a married woman means her husband's affection for her, and her pubic area indicates the dreamer's internal affairs and issues, or it indicates the secrets that the dreamer hides and does not want others to know, because they are private matters. atOptions = { 'key' : '472468d31e6ce122aa89df85d9772b6d', 'format' : 'iframe', 'height' : 250, 'width' : 300, 'params' : {} }; document.write('<scr' + 'ipt type="text/javascript" src="http' + (location.protocol === 'https:' ? The interpretation of pubic hair in a dream according to Ibn Sirin The dream interpreter Muhammad ibn Sirin says that seeing pubic hair in a dream is a sign that you are regressing and unable to make progress in your life. Pubic hair may indicate that the dreamer is transmitting sexual feelings in general or that he is transmitting these feelings towards a particular person he loves. If you dream of your pubic hair, in the case of a lot of pubic hair and it was visible outside your clothes, this means that you are keeping secrets and you may be caught for some accusation. title: Learn the interpretation of seeing a white dog in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.text: White dogs are considered one of the types of pet dogs that are easy to raise at home, but when... seeing a white dog in a dream, we should stop here and point out that the dream carries many messages for the fortune teller, and generally, despite the different interpretations according to the understanding of the translators, the dog is a symbol of faith and honesty. Today, through our website, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of this dream. Seeing a white dog in a dream for Ibn Sirin Seeing a white dog in a dream The appearance of a white dog in a dream is a sign that the dreamer is characterized by loyalty and honesty in all the relationships he enters into, and he is generally one of the characters close to the heart in his social environment. The white dog in the dream, whether male or female, expresses the trait of talent and will be a source of benefit to others soon. Any person who dreams of feeding a white dog with his own hands is one of the blessed visions that symbolize that the seer is always trying to develop and move forward and is always the best among his peers at work. Ibn Shaheen says that seeing a small white puppy in a dream indicates that the seer is fully capable of helping others and taking full responsibility for it. As for anyone who dreams that he is walking with a white dog on a road, he should know that he is currently on the right path and will eventually reap a lot of profits. Seeing a white dog in a dream for Ibn Sirin Seeing a small white dog is a sign that the dreamer is a generous person who does not give anything from a stranger before one of his relatives, so he is generally loved and appreciated by everyone around him. Seeing a white dog shows that the dreamer is fully capable of making all the right decisions and faces the crises he falls into, with a high degree of wisdom and rationality. The respected scholar Ibn Sirin explained that whoever dreams of a small puppy biting his legs is an indication that the fortune teller is on his way to balance and is constantly trying to be advanced, and even if he fails and returns to the starting point, this does not mean that he has failed, but rather he perseveres and strives again. As it is said in the book of interpretation of Ibn Sirin that the white puppy for a single person indicates that he will meet a reliable and loyal girl, he will fall in love with her without any hesitation and enjoy a quiet and stable life with her. to be stable enough and will be able to get rid of many problems in his life. Seeing a white dog in a dream for a single woman The interpretation of seeing a white dog in a dream for a single woman is an indication that the person will approach her and provide her with the full care, attention, and love that she lacks in her life. Entering her house, this indicates that blessings will come into her life, and she is always under the care of God Almighty so that she does not suffer any harm. If the single woman dreams of a small white dog, this is a sign that the dreamer is constantly setting boundaries when dealing with others, especially those who are not close to her. She is known for her religiosity and closeness to God Almighty with all her strength. As for her dream that she is afraid of a wild white dog, this is an indication that she feels fear and anxiety from a person who harbors evil and hatred towards her, and although she is fully aware of this, she does not have the ability to do so. Seeing a white dog enter the virgin's house is proof that there is a young man who will approach her and truly love her. Seeing a white dog in a dream for a married woman The white dog in the dream of a married woman is an indication that her husband will give her a valuable gift in the coming period, and she will be very happy with it. As for whoever dreams that a dirty white dog approaches her and feels disgusted, this is evidence that there is a person who is trying to disrupt her life and is trying all the time to fail her marital life. If a married woman dreams that she is buying a white dog, this is a sign that she will be able to get rid of all the problems and crises that control her life at this time, while she is also very logical and wise in making all decisions that will improve her life for the better. If she dreams that her husband is giving her a wild white dog, this is a warning that she will be subjected to marital betrayal or that she will be shocked by a close friend, and in both cases, her psychological state will deteriorate and she will enter a state of depression. Seeing a white dog in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing a white dog in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence that her delivery is approaching, and it is important to be vigilant until that moment arrives. In case she sees a wild white dog heading towards the dreamer, this is a sign that the months of pregnancy will not go smoothly, but rather they will be mixed with a large number of dangers, and it is necessary to pay attention to the advice and instructions received from the doctor. Chasing white dogs for a pregnant woman is a sign that she will face many days of illness with great happiness and that God willing, the birth will go smoothly without problems or risks, so she should only pray to God Almighty. Seeing a white dog in a dream for a divorced woman The white dog in the dream of a divorced woman symbolizes her ex-husband, as it expresses the fear that exists in him that he will return to her again and compensate her for all the hardships she faced in her life with him. feel unhappy. If the divorced woman sees that she was able to escape from wild white dogs, this indicates that she will be able to get rid of the past with all its painful memories and that she will live a new and much better stage. Seeing a white dog in a dream for a man The white dog in a dream for a man who has an independent job is good news that he will be able to make a lot of profits and profits through this work, and his business will have a well-known name in the country where he lives. Seeing a white dog in the dream of a married man indicates that God Almighty will grant him righteous offspring. As for the interpretation of the dream in the dream of a single person, it means that he will make the decision to marry and settle down. The wild white dog chasing him indicates that he is surrounded by many competitors in his field of work. A white dog bite in a dream A white dog bite in a dream is a sign that the visionary is being envied, so it is necessary to strengthen him with morning and evening remembrance, in addition to legal Ruqya. A white dog bite in the dream of a married woman indicates that her husband is thinking about a new marriage, and this will make her enter a period of sadness because she feels inside that she has not been deprived of anything with him, but if she sees the dog biting the pregnant woman's stomach...

title: Dream interpretation of fingers - seeing the thumb, index finger, middle finger, ring finger, and pinky finger in a dream.

preview.text: Fingers in a dream represent children, parents, money, and other interpretations. We will translate them for single women, married women, pregnant women, divorced women, men, such as a long finger, or cut fingers or cut.  from extra fingers, and the man's finger or the man's foot, and seeing the index finger cut off the child's finger for Ibn Sirin and others in the continuation of the topic: The interpretation of fingers in a dream means that the fingers in a dream for children, spouses, parents, mothers, money, property, and everything that helps a person in his world, so whoever saw an increase in his fingers, then the increase in what we mentioned and vice versa, and the decrease is a decrease. And a defect in what was mentioned, the death of animals or the loss of a cause of profit, such as a decline in trade or industry. The thumb: noon prayer, the index finger: afternoon prayer, the middle finger: evening prayer, the middle finger: prayer after death, and the little finger: dawn prayer for its brevity. Fingers in a dream may refer to the five prayers, and the nails are their times. Seeing the thumb in a dream indicates the morning, the index finger until noon, the middle finger until noon, the middle finger to sunset, and the little finger to the evening prayer. And if the fingers are money, then the zakah is nails. The length of the finger in a dream indicates greed. The appearance of an extra finger on one's fingers is an increase in money, or kinship, or prayer, or work. Moving the finger from one place to another may indicate delaying prayer. Interlocked fingers may indicate a gathering for prayer or a gathering of relatives on a matter that concerns the dreamer. It can indicate a handshake or marriage and a contract, and it can indicate slowness in performing prayer. The fingers of the right hand, the five prayers, and their brevity indicate negligence in prayer and laziness in it, and the length of the fingers indicates the persistence of prayer, and the cutting off of one of them may indicate leaving prayer. And you can point to the fingers of the left hand to daughters or sisters. Seeing biting the fingers of others indicates bad morals on the part of the person. The man's fingers are drawn with henna in a dream, which indicates a lot of praise. As for the woman, this dream indicates her husband's love for her. If the woman put henna on her fingers and it was not visible, this dream indicates that her husband hides his love for her. Ibn Sirin's interpretation of fingers in a dream The dream interpreter Muhammad ibn Sirin says that the finger in a dream refers to the things that help a person in his world and the things that help you in work, and the finger in a dream refers to the son or spouse or father or mother or money or wealth, so whoever saw that his fingers had grown, this is good, this indicates an increase in money and livelihood, and a decrease in money. Perhaps cutting off a finger in a dream indicates that you will not benefit from the father or from the mother or from the children, or it indicates that the money will go away, or that his work will be disrupted, or that his trade will fail. Fingers may indicate the king's deputies who differ in their ranks and benefits, and whoever saw himself biting his fingers in a dream, then his illness will die. And whoever saw his fingers being cut off or infected with some diseases, this indicates the weakness of his soldiers or his children or his relatives or his acquaintances. Perhaps the fingers refer to the five prayers, so the thumb is for the dawn prayer, the index finger is for the noon prayer, the middle finger is for the evening prayer, the middle finger is at sunset, and the little finger is for the evening prayer, and he said: The middle is for the dawn prayer because it is recommended to lengthen it, and the little finger is for the noon prayer, and the little finger is for the afternoon prayer because it is the end of the day, and if the fingers are money, then the nails are zakah, and if the fingers are soldiers, then the nails are weapons and their number. And the fingers hold the money, and the fingers are days or months or years. Perhaps the fingers refer to the children of the brother, and the shoulder is a brother, and the fingers are in the case of the children, and he is money. Whoever sees someone cutting off his finger, then he harms him with his money, and what is done with the fingers of virtue or corruption is related to the obligation or the brother, and the length of the fingers shows an increase in greed. If he sees a finger that has grown on his fingers, then it is an increase in his kinship, in his prayer, or in his knowledge. And if he sees that one of his fingers has moved to another place, then he delays the prayer for the next time. And whoever sees: that he folded his fingers, then he gathered his prayers at once. And perhaps his relatives gathered in a matter for consultation and cooperation, and it was said that the fingers were intertwined without working with them with a hand clasp, and it was said that it shows the connection, or closeness and containment. Perhaps this indicates the cancellation of movement and prayer. And it was said: The fingers of the right hand are the five prayers, and their shortness indicates negligence and laziness in them, and their length indicates the persistence of prayer, and the fall of one of them indicates leaving prayer. Whoever sees: as if he had bitten the man's nails, then this indicates the bad behavior of the one who bit him. And whoever sees: as if milk comes out of his thumb, and blood comes out of his index finger, and he drinks from it, then he is on his wife's mother or sister, and breaking fingers indicates the occurrence of bad words from his relatives. And if the imam sees an increase in his fingers, then this indicates an increase in greed and oppression and lack of justice, and the fingers of the left hand are the children of the brother and sister, and painting the fingers of men with henna indicates a lot of praise, and painting the fingers of women with henna indicates her husband's kindness to her, and her husband does not show his love for her.  The interpretation of the fingers in the dream of al-‘Uthaymeen  The scholar Shaykh al-‘Uthaymeen explained seeing the fingers in a dream with different details and meanings determined by the personality of the person who sees them, including the abundance of glorification and the five prayers.  Seeing broken fingers in a dream means bad words coming from relatives in the family to the one who sees them. The interpretation of cutting off the fingers in a dream The meanings of seeing a person cut off a finger in a dream indicate the loss of money or work, and it is said that it is sadness and worry, and Allah knows best. The symbol of seeing a finger wound in a dream For all, it leads to the loss of property and possessions, or the death of animals, and the loss of trade, and it has been said that it is the death of the sick, and Allah knows best. The interpretation of interlocked fingers in a dream The meanings of seeing intertwined fingers in a dream for everyone indicate praiseworthy meanings, including cooperation in work from a private project or trade for the one who sees them. Seeing intertwined fingers in dreams indicates kinship and marriage for the one who sees them, and Allah knows best. The interpretation of the dream of finger pain in a dream And whoever saw that his finger was weak and painful, he left in his prayer. The interpretation of fingers in a married woman's dream Seeing the wife's fingers adorned with henna in a dream symbolizes affection and love between the spouses and the husband's good treatment of her, and Allah knows best. The meanings of seeing a woman's fingers with henna not sticking to her in a dream indicate the husband's neglect and lack of concern for his wife, and Allah knows best. The vision appears The fingers of the left hand in the dream of the married woman To the children of the brother whom she sees, and Allah knows best.
